thread.title: A new Friday the 13th multiplayer game will let you play as Jason or camp counsellors
thread.title_full: A new Friday the 13th multiplayer game will let you play as Jason or camp counsellors

title: A new Friday the 13th multiplayer game will let you play as Jason or camp counsellors
text: Tuesday, Oct 13 2015, 22:09 BST Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share on Google+ Horror fans, you're in for a treat with a brand new Friday the 13th multiplayer game set at Camp Crystal Lake.The Kickstarter-funded title lets you play either as the camp councillors who are terrified for their lives or as Jason, the machete-wielding masked killer. Friday the 13th: The Game is a third-person, asymmetrical multiplayer title with one person in charge of Jason and seven others controlling the camp councillors trying to escape from Camp Crystal Lake.As Jason, you can act out nightmare-inducing murders and, rather disturbingly, the Kickstarter page described examples in detail."Grab a counsellor in a choke hold, pick them up off the ground, and smash their face into a tree. Repeatedly. "Or how about lifting a counsellor up above your head as they kick and scream, holding them aloft long enough to walk near a rack of farm spikes to slam your victim down upon them?"The game is currently almost at $115K of its $700K target.
